title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 487.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 487.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of the consumer product protection rules is to
ensure that thorough and uniform procedures are used by all agencies in the
investigation of consumer product tampering complaints. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
487.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
